title: Gucha: Distant Trumpet
occurrences: This is Gucha, the greatest trumpet festival in the world.
Winning the Golden Trumpet in Gucha is a dream for us trumpeters.
...goes to Gucha as the first trumpet.
Sandokhan why did you go so quiet? See you in Gucha, redneck!
Gucha's starting, you know what that means to us.
If I can't play in front of a dozen people, why go to Gucha at all?
and let her hear the distant trumpet
He wants to go to Gucha just because of that white slut of his!
That's why I want to go to Gucha. To give my father a tombstone...
What to perform with in Gucha, sis?
You'll show him who you are in Gucha.
Gucha will not be easy. I may not even go.
Rocky frightened the Tigers into thinking he should go to Gucha.
I promise with all my Tigers these rednecks will pay in Gucha!
Gucha is going to start soon, and I haven't tuned up the band.
If I beat him in Gucha... -And...
I reached Gucha, and across unknown fields and meadows, through gardens
when I heard the familiar sound of a distant trumpet.
If you won't take me to Gucha, I'll bring her here!
If you win at Gucha.
God, she doesn't know I can't win at Gucha any more.
What now, if I'm not going to Gucha?!
Do you want to go to Gucha or not?!
After Gucha, they will! -If we pay them...
I'm gonna play that bloody first trumpet myself in Gucha.
Not really, just for Gucha.
Win that Golden Trumpet in Gucha!
Where? -To Gucha.
Gucha?!
...and I want you to be present when Trandafilovich's conquers Gucha!
...of the Gucha Festival, where the trumpet reigns...
Come on, get out. -Welcome to you Gucha!
They say once you've played and won in Gucha...
